snp3.12:26.4: sn36.2:3.4 has _virajjati_. See Bodhi’s note 1735 for the readings and commentary in both contexts.
snp3.12:33.3: I take _ārambha_ here as having the same sense as _samārambha_ at an4.195. But see too the sense of “transgression” at an5.142.
snp3.12:40.3: _Saṅkhāya sevī_ refers to the monastic practice of making use of requisites, including food, only after reflection on them.
snp3.12:43.3: Text treats _iñjita_ as _eja_ and the translations should reflect this.
